mapper.select: select pb.`no` as 'no', pb.title as title, pb.content as content, pb.tag as tag, pb.download as download, pb.source as source, pb.data_no as data_no, pb.create_at as create_at, pb.update_at as update_at, pb.view as view, us.nickname as user_nickname, ( select count(*) from `like` as li where li.board_no = pb.no AND li.type = 1 ) as 'like' from public_board as pb left join chickengak.user as us on pb.USER_NO = us.no limit #{page}, #{interval}

select pb.`no` as 'no', pb.title as title, pb.content as content, pb.tag as tag, pb.download as download, pb.source as source, pb.data_no as data_no, pb.create_at as create_at, pb.update_at as update_at, pb.view as view, us.nickname as user_nickname, ( select count(*) from `like` as li where li.board_no = pb.no AND li.type = 1 ) as 'like' from public_board as pb left join chickengak.user as us on pb.USER_NO = us.no
pb.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') pb.content like CONCAT('%',#{content},'%') us.nickname = #{nickname}

select pb.`no` as 'no', pb.title as title, pb.content as content, pb.tag as tag, pb.download as download, pb.source as source, pb.data_no as data_no, pb.create_at as create_at, pb.update_at as update_at, pb.view as view, ( select count(*) from `like` as li where li.board_no = pb.`no` AND li.type = 1 ) as 'like', us.nickname as user_nickname from public_board as pb left join chickengak.user as us on pb.USER_NO = us.`no` where pb.`no` = #{no}
mapper.update: update public_board set view = view + 1 where no = #{no}
update public_board set download = download + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into `like` ( board_no, user_no, type ) values ( #{board_no}, #{user_no}, 1 )
